title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 95.6 - Time for answer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 95.6 - Time for answer

State Regulations

The respondent hospital governing body may, at least five days prior to the date specified in the notice of hearing, file a written verified answer to the complaint and serve a copy thereof upon the complainant personally or by mail addressed to the complainant at his address as set forth in the complaint. Notes

95.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
